# Results from NSHMP 2008 Fortran for the 8 CEUS GMPE's
# Results are ground motion mean and sigma for:
#
# 	distance  R = 0km, 10km, 100km
# 	magnitude M = 5.05, 5.75, 6.45, 7.15
# 	period    P = 0.0 (PGA), 0.2sec, 1.0sec, 2.0sec
#
# This result set is for firm rock (BC) sites and using
# the Atkinson and Boore mblg conversion
